description: Each Pokémon you capture in an 8th generation Pokémon game is saved in a separate PK8 file. These PK8 files are stored in your saved game file.
While most players will never encounter a PK8 file, those who have hacked their game can create, modify, and import PK8 files into saved games using the player-created PKHeX utility.

common_filenames.description: [Pokémon name].pk8 - Each PK8 file is named for the Pokémon it contains.
